title: Video of Drone With Fireworks A Prank, Not an Act of Revenge
subtitle: Fact Check Of Brazil Video Of Drone With Fireworks Prank: While the incident did happen, it was not done with an intention of revenge. Rather, Lucas Albert, a Brazil-based social media influencer, who had published this video on 14 July, pulled up this act as a prank on his friends.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video circulating on social media, showing drones being loaded with fireworks, is being shared with the claim that it was done by an angry man in order to take revenge from his “loud” neighbours.

Journalist Pramod Madhav shared the video on Twitter with the same claim.
